description.value:
Starting at 10th level, you learn the spell @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.StNXJMU3vcM9fKrA]{Evard's Black Tentacles}. It counts as a warlock spell for you, but it doesn't count against the number of spells you know. You can also cast it once without using a spell slot, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.

Whenever you cast this spell, your patron's magic bolsters you, granting you a number of temporary hit points equal to your warlock level. Moreover, damage can't break your concentration on this spell.

Note: Create two copies of Evard's Black Tentacles on your character. On both copies, add a Damage Formula with a value @classes.warlock.levels temporary hit points.

On one copy, set Preparation Mode to Always Prepared. On the second copy, set Preparation Mode to Innate with 1 use per Long Rest.

magicitems.destroyFlavorText: reaches 0 charges: it crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.
